data.name: The Amazing American Circus - The Ringmaster's Essentials
data.detailed_description:
Grab a fantastic digital Cookbook with recipes from the game. Check out what exactly you’ll be feeding your artists - and if the poor souls deserve it. What’s more, there’s a special lore book that will introduce you to the strange and fascinating world of the turn of the 20th century! And if that is not enough, you will get a Kickstarter-funded Black Peter’s card game in digital form, but ready to be printed! And, last but not least, there’s also an amazing map of the USA as depicted in the game!

  • The official Cookbook
  • The official lore book
  • A set of wallpapers
  • A digital map of the game
  • A circus-inspired Black Peter card set (ready to be printed!)
  • Video and graphic materials

data.short_description: The Ringmaster’s Essentials is a set of digital goodies for The Amazing American Circus.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible soundcard
